com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.operations

Class OperationMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.operations.OperationMarshaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannelListener, IOperationInvoker

    public final class OperationMarshaller
extends Object
implements IOperationInvoker, IChannelListener
    Operation marshallers are used to invoke operations on remote cluster nodes. Operations can take parameters and can return a response. It is possible to specify that an operation invocation should return a response before actually executing (this can be handy when using an operation to shutdown a remote cluster node for example).
    Operation invocations and replies are exchanged on top of a single communication channel. Message dispatching is achieved using message types through the medium of a ChannelMessageMultiplexer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OperationMarshaller

        public OperationMarshaller(ChannelMessageMultiplexer messageMultiplexer,
                           MessageType operationInvocationMessageType,
                           MessageType operationReplyMessageType,
                           IOperationExecutor operationExecutor,
                           long timeout,
                           HABufferFactory bufferFactory)
        Constructor.
        Constructs a new operation marshaller that executes operation before replying to them.
        Parameters:
        messageMultiplexer - the message multiplexer with which this operation marshaller should register for receiving messages and that should be used for sending messages
        operationInvocationMessageType - the MessageType to use for invoking this operation
        operationReplyMessageType - the MessageType to use for replying to invocations of this operation
        operationExecutor - the operation executor.
        timeout - the operation invocation timeout
        bufferFactory - the HA buffer factory to use in serialization and deserialization

      • OperationMarshaller

        public OperationMarshaller(ChannelMessageMultiplexer messageMultiplexer,
                           MessageType operationInvocationMessageType,
                           MessageType operationReplyMessageType,
                           IOperationExecutor operationExecutor,
                           long timeout,
                           boolean replyBeforeExecuting,
                           HABufferFactory bufferFactory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        messageMultiplexer - the message multiplexer with which this operation marshaller should register for receiving messages and that should be used for sending messages
        operationInvocationMessageType - the MessageType to use for invoking this operation
        operationReplyMessageType - the MessageType to use for replying to invocations of this operation
        operationExecutor - the operation executor.
        timeout - the operation invocation timeout
        replyBeforeExecuting - If true, then upon reception of an operation invocation message, the reply to that operation will be sent before actually executing the operation. This is typically useful in situations where executing the operation would prevent the response from being sent (like a shutdown operation for example). It is important to note that this also implies that the actual result of invoking the operation will be discarded.
        bufferFactory - the HA buffer factory to use in serialization and deserialization

        replyBeforeExecuting - If true, then upon reception of an operation invocation message, the reply to that operation will be sent before actually executing the operation. This is typically useful in situations where executing the operation would prevent the response from being sent (like a shutdown operation for example). It is important to note that this also implies that the actual result of invoking the operation will be discarded.
